entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • missing runtime link using old RIDs #88223
  • Convert remaining COM-based libraries to use source-generated COM #88220
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make AddBinaryFormattedResource obsolete #88217
  • MemberNotNullAttribute not working as expected when member is in a parent Interface/Class #88216
  • JSImportGenerator renders VS completely unusable when making edits in large projects #88215
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Quaternion and Plane #88207
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add json option to fallback to parsing value from string if type implements `IParsable/ISpanParsable` and enable it by default #88206
  • ComInterfaceGenerator provides confusing warning for arrays with [InAttribute] #88205
    8.0.0
  • ExcecutionEngineException when using StringBuilder on long strings #88199
    8.0.0
  • System.ArgumentException: Stream does not support reading. (Parameter 'stream') when reading from HttpMessageResponse.Content.ReadAsStringAsync() #88198
  • Incorrect parsing of X500 DNs with binary content #88197
  • HttpListenerResponse.Abort does not abort and sends a response on Mac OS #88196
  • Strange behaviur when registering Open Generics inside DI container #88192
  • [mono][ios] EventPipe processinfo3 test is failing on iOS-like platforms #88186
    8.0.0
  • Revisit ImmutableExtensions.TryCopyTo behavior for ICollection<T> #88181
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization workaround instead of insufficiently sized destination buffer exception #88180
  • Regressions in FrozenDictionary #88202
  • [wasm] NET8 previews performance tracking #88178
    8.0.0
  • windows-x86 release MSBuild_CMake is failing #88172
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure DataContractSerializerTests.DCS_MyPersonSurrogate_Stress #84392
  • Program throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException in Release #88091
    8.0.0
  • GeneratedConfigurationBinder type is generated with no content #85057
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationBindingGenerator Fails with ArgumentOutOfRangeException #86557
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: TryFindSystemTimeZoneById #66928
    Future
  • [mono][interp] Enum.CompareTo returns incorrect result when enum has bool underlying type #88170
    8.0.0
  • StackTraces are wrong in Tier-1 with tiered compilation enabled #88189
  • [Mono]Undeclared identifier 'MDBGPROT_CMD_TYPE_GET_VALUES_ICORDBG' #87392
  • ZipArchive disposes passed stream twice #79695
    Future
  • Build windows-x86 release MSBuild_CMake leg failing on PRs #88195
  • X509Certificate2 class unable to read Subject data from some certificates on WSL/Docker containers/Linux #88037
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions on 5/2/2023 10:35:24 AM #85987
    8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] [HttpStress] Client failing to connect #87938
  • Please add the pattern to the summary of GeneratedRegex partial method #88121
  • Client authorization with HttpClient fails unless the client cert is installed in windows cert store #87561
  • HTTPClient throw many System.IO.IOException in .NET6 & .NET7 #86422
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 13 Regressions on 12/15/2022 1:59:35 AM #79973
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Generalized struct promotion #76928
    8.0.0
  • DOTNET_DiagnosticPorts doesn't work for the runtime with listen mode #88177
  • NativeAOT fails to catch rethrown exception in edge cases #88128
    8.0.0
  • Poor codegen for "big" (> 4 fields) structs init #71565
    8.0.0
  • Poor performance/code-gen with struct enumerators, especially when containing ReadOnlySpan #71510
    8.0.0
  • Span<T> wrapped in a struct isn't performing as fast as it could be #68797
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Slow spills to stack in a loop on Linux vs Windows #58522
    8.0.0
  • Jit: Sub-optimal code when function is inlined #32415
    8.0.0
  • Recursive Promotion of structs containing fields of structs with a single pointer-sized field #7576
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT x86: allow long-typed struct fields to be recursively promoted #6707
    8.0.0
  • Promote (scalar replace) structs with more than 4 fields #6534
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add compat source generator for System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generator to .net Framework #76369
    Future
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions mono regressions #77129
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #83399
    8.0.0
  • Can not build System.Runtime solution inside VS. The type or namespace name 'SearchValues<>' could not be found #87624
  • SYSLIB1045 Use GeneratedRegexAttribute replaces verbatim string with regular string #88122
  • System.Text.Json #88143
  • Compile corehost.sln Error NETSDK1013 TargetFramework value "" is not recognized #88116
  • NativeAOT SetCreateObject on JsonTypeInfo<T> could be slimmed down #83608
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Flush the gclog after GC #88222
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update CompilerPlatformTestingVersion version #88221
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2212176 #88219
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE][wasm] refactoring wbt a bit #88218
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • fix TLS resume with HttpClientHandler on Linux #88214
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Specially consider CLong, CULong and Guid strictly blittable #88213
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Do not say the wrong default behavior for blittable arrays in ComInterfaceGenerator warning #88212
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Reduce allocations in Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration #88211
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Android] Add NdkToolFinder task & Fix up AOT app build #88210
    area-Build-mono
  • Disable Aot and Trim analyzers when building runtime tests #88209
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Create a doc outlining ownership rules for the ComInterfaceGenerator #88203
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [nativeaot][perf] Simplify the build process for the perf measurements #88201
    area-Infrastructure, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Apply a number of improvements and bugfixes to JsonNode #88194
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Improve enum documentation #88191
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Workaround for insufficiently sized destination buffer #88184
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Use wider look-up table while searching chars on Arm64 #88183
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Refactor physical promotion store decomposition slightly #88182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix MSBuild integration for the host build with CMake 3.26 #88208
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug changes #87979
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Replace EventWrittenEventArgs.EmptyPayload with ReadOnlyCollection.Empty singleton #87906
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: fix case where RBO leads to an invalid CSE #88159
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark a new test as NativeAotIncompatible #88176
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • TarEntry: small fix-up. #88118
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Update dependencies for dotnet/optimization to build 20230626.3 #88200
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Delete some dead code #88139
    area-VM-coreclr
  • ZipArchive now disposes given stream only once #87982
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • TryFindSystemTimeZoneById #88071
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Update NugetProjectModelVersion and NugetPackagingVersion from 6.2.2 to 6.2.4 #88107
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Fix handling of boolean comparison #88193
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Discard lastIndexMarshalled variable if it is not otherwise used #88060
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Support displaying AttributeValue in binary form #88144
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Improve verbose output of dumped instructions #88185
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Clone AllowTlsResume as part of SslClientAuthenticationOptionsExtensions.ShallowClone #88155
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Bump SharedArrayPool's max arrays per partition default from 8 to 32 #87905
    area-System.Buffers
  • Use Utf8.IsValid in System.Text.Json #88165
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Augment generated regex XML comment with original pattern and options #88175
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono] Use InlineArrayAttribute for ArgumentData and StackAllocatedByRefs #88149
    area-System.Reflection
  • Use LLD linker when targeting Bionic #88179
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement casing functions #87919
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2211662 #88169
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Enable physical promotion by default #88090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Use latest sdk for workload testing #88173
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove redundant call to ConvertToCanonForm #88171
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert Volatile to JIT intrinsics #88073
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix NativeAOT rethrow bug #88113
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Do not run chmod on Windows #88174
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NamedPipeServerStream.Unix: GetImpersonationUserName tweaks. #88125
    area-System.Net, community-contribution

Updated

  • [CI test] SearchValues<string> #88166
    NO-REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Pass exact context to getMethodInfo #88025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tweak the register order for xarch to better account for callee saved #88151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Add IHostedLifecycleService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, 8.0.0
  • Don't emit nor generate the manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource #86850
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection debugging #88082
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add clr.tools subset to runtime-community #88160
    area-Build-mono, arch-s390x
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Possible fix for 84564 #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove handwritten binding logic from Logging.Console; use generator instead #88067
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add BinaryData.ContentType #87744
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Speed up KeyAnalyser #87590
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add missing compiler-generated attributes to corelib #87857
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Complete interp PackedSimd support and expand jiterp support #87903
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [wasm] Introduce <InvariantTimezone> build flag #87284
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] When HybridGlobalization mode is on load hybrid icu file #88041
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #87175
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.8
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Suppress System.Drawing.Common dependency from System.Windows.Extensions #88157
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (6/6) #88093
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Fix ProfileEnter / ProfileLeave #88134
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove a quirk in regular promotion #88130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] CI for running wbt with multithreaded runtime #87895
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Relaxing IsConnected Check for Datagram Sockets #87916
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Put the shadow stack allocator into its own class #2324

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use specialized allocators for WASM #2320
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Introduce a shadow stack allocation phase #2322
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Don't hook into LLVM error reporting in the Jit #2323

Updated

  • ManagedZLib Experiment #2325
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to june 23 #2318
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Double-align the shadow frame when necessary #2315
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Call runtime imports implemented by runtime exports directly #2321

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to build project using latest .NET sdk #33705
  • Roll-forward enabled with `PackAsTool` #33704
  • New standalone `info` command #33697
  • Command design: dotnet add/list/remove package/reference #33675

PullRequests

Created

  • Reenable in-test timeout #33700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Pass editorconfig files to RazorCoreCompile #33695
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fixed some issues with `details` command #33694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • GenerateRuntimeConfig now uses stream serialization instead of loading file in memory #22576
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix "Registry is not supported on this platform" with mono #33682
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33671
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't set UseApphost or SelfContained to true for PublishAot #33229
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Use install state in workload manifest provider #33643
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [iOS] Add HybridGlobalization flag in dotnet/sdk #33669
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Fast, Efficient Unions #7016
  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typos in LDM-2023-02-27.md #7305

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • It looks like function pointer tests are hardcoded to perform testing at language version 9. #68835
  • Compiler crashes when attempting to compile string interpolation concatenation with parentheses applied #68834
  • Compiler crashes on a specific syntax involving implicit operators and tuples #68833

Closed

  • [SUGGESTION] Solution-wide analysis #104 #68553

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid quadratic lookup of namespace declarations #68832
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge features/CollectionLiterals into main #68831
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #68827
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Collection literals: address comments #68793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Lookahead parsing for collection exprs vs. local functions. #68807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve parser error recovery for certain collection-literal cases #68788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Source generators/track values etw #68830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Simplify and make consistent query-context tracking in the parser #68757
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enhance the SARIF v2 log to report analyzer execution time #68607
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [LSP pull diagnostics] Handle background analysis scope options for both compiler and analyzer diagnostics #68818
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Terrible performance from repeated non-incremental calls to static web assets targets #49097
  • HttpRequest.Form throws an undocumented System.InvalidOperationException #49096
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter, updates #49095
  • WASM Cors fails despite allowing everything #49094
  • ClientAssets release for dotnet 7 #49092
    8.0-preview7
  • Perf regression: json #49090
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #49089

Closed

  • Optional Blazor Webassembly Components #45627
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Install the BlazorWasmDebugging VS Code extension with the C# extension #46485
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Components] Enable a root component to be the entry point for component based apps #7528
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Give the BlazorWasmDebugging extension a proper name #46486
    .NET 8 Planning
  • `dotnet new --update-apply` thinks 1.0.0-beta9 is newer than 1.0.0-beta10 and above #49077
  • Give error if a component is rendermode boundary and has parameter of type RenderFragment or RenderFragment<T> #48968
    8.0-preview7
  • [.NET 6] Backport the GenerateMvcTestManifestTask fix #48189
    6.0.x
  • Route parameters with non-string values fails #48866
    8.0-preview7
  • Hosted services start later with minimal API #39037
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Quarantine HubConnectionTest.sendsCloseMessageOnStop() #49043

PullRequests

Created

  • Add WithOrder to IEndpointConventionBuilder #49093
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix invalid catch block in StringUtilities #49082
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Fixes a typo in the components template #48962
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview7
  • Callsite rendermodes (#48967) #49055
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Remove IRoutingStateProvider from Router #49083
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Use correct casing for WebAssembly in template text #49085
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Ignore pings on sendsCloseMessageOnStop #49067
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    area-infrastructure
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure
  • Bug hash routing same page with params or query #48994
    area-blazor
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Update milestones for August servicing #48782
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
  • Change the way we detect Node.js in SignalR JS/TS client. #49066
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make dotnet-symbol available as standalone/self-contained download #4030

PullRequests

Updated

  • ProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #3985

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView or ListView inside Border or Frame with nested Grids throws exception on dragging and resizing #15935
  • Binding to an array property in an object will fail (raise NoSuchMethodException or other) in release, but not in debug configuration #15933
  • .NET MAUI Shell app page navigation memory leaks #15930
  • .NET MAUI not supported on Ubuntu #15929
  • [Android] DeviceDisplay.Current.MainDisplayInfoChanged does not work #15927
  • NullReferenceException in Font.Equals #15925
  • Incorrect/Cut off shadows #15924
  • Blazor Hybrid: When debugging certain events in VisualStudio, e.g. Entry.TextChanged, breakpoints are not being hit and VisualStudio shows an error "No Compatible code running on the thread" #15923

Closed

  • Fixing Invalidation Context error for MAUI iOS #15758
  • problem with pointer gesture recognizer command parameters #15466
    .NET 8
  • RefreshView+CollectionView is broken in a Modal presentation with style PageSheet on iOS #15898
  • Evaluate slider increment defaults for consistency and accessibility #14748
  • Navigating using flyout menu causes all items after first item in TabBar to dissapear. #13134
    Backlog
  • ScrollView is affecting MVVM databinding in second tab of Tabbed Page for .Net 7.0 MAUI on Android API level 30 and above #15389
  • FileSystem.AppDataDirectory get different path between debug and deployed #11306
    Backlog
  • Month name is shown by computer region option not by computer language #14589

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] bump to xamarin/xamarin-android/main@efa14e26 #15934
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 branch #15931
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview6] Bump to xamarin/xamarin-android/release/8.0.1xx-preview6@e55038e5 #15926
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15921
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] "Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size (#14902) (#15653)" #15915
  • Fix PointerGesture CommandParameter properties #15863
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Bump powershell from 7.3.4 to 7.3.5 #15911
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [release/7.0.2xx-sr7] [net7.0] "Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size (#14902) (#15653)" #15917
  • Use default SmallChange value for WinUI slider #14912
    area/controls 🎮, control-slider

Updated

  • Backport WinUI DeviceTest Fixes #15840
    area/testing
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Various fixes for Border on Android #15458
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
    area/layout 🔲
  • Add 'TranslateXTo' and 'TranslateYTo' to 'ViewExtensions'. #15906
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [X] Connect event to internal handler #15881
    area/Xaml </>
  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing
  • Android ecosytem updates #15399
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md #15777
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query/Json: use Utf8JsonReader in materializer #31159
  • Disable lazy loading temporarily for a query #31158
  • InvalidProgramException: Invalid IL code (in-the-wild observation) #31156

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #31159 - Query/Json: use Utf8JsonReader in materializer #31160
  • Wired up new JSON mapping infra stuff #31157

Updated

  • Use IDbSetCache.GetSets() when checking for resettable services #31154

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Need offline installer for .NET7+ #16593
  • [NETSDKE2E] On Debian only, SDK dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.6.23310.1-x64.deb installing failed with error: archive 'dotnet-sdk-x64.deb' uses unknown compression for member 'control.tar.zst' ling faile #16646
  • Microsoft .Net Core Version 5.0.17 keeps reinstalling #14473

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #16859
  • SB smoke tests: test the published output #16858
  • Include RID in SB artifact file names #16855
    Area-SourceBuild

Merged

  • Update the table to include preview 6 #16778
  • Update SDK-diff baseline - removal of runtime Intellisense entries #16849

Updated

  • Add a source-build smoke test for native debug symbols #16488
    Area-SourceBuild
  • [release/6.01xx] Update source-build CI to Fedora 38 #16649
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Update SB SDK diff baseline for 6.0 #16822
